item.title: The C Programming Language
item.description: CHAPTER 1: A Tutorial Introduction 1.1 Getting Started 1.2 Variables and Arithmetic Expressions 1.3 The For Statement 1.4 Symbolic Constants 1.5 Character Input and Output 1.5.1 File Copying 1.5.2 Character Counting 1.5.3 Line Counting 1.5.4 Word Counting 1.6 Arrays 1.7 Functions 1.8 Argumentsâ€”Call by Value 1.9 Character Arrays 1.10 External Variables and Scope CHAPTER 1: A Tutorial Introduction Let us begin with a quick introduction to C.
